QueryList.Join: <%if(has(lastUpdateDateTime)){%> AND lastUpdateDateTime=:lastUpdateDateTime <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_not)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime <> :lastUpdateDateTime_not <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_li)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime like '%'||:lastUpdateDateTime_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_gt)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime>:lastUpdateDateTime_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_ge)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime>=:lastUpdateDateTime_ge <%}%> <%if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_lt)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime<:lastUpdateDateTime_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(lastUpdateDateTime_le)){%> and A.lastUpdateDateTime<=:lastUpdateDateTime_le <%}%> <%if(has(logicStatus)){%> AND logicStatus=:logicStatus <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_not)){%> and A.logicStatus <> :logicStatus_not <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_li)){%> and A.logicStatus like '%'||:logicStatus_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(logicStatus_gt)){%> and A.logicStatus>:logicStatus_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_ge)){%> and A.logicStatus>=:logicStatus_ge <%}%> <%if (has(logicStatus_lt)){%> and A.logicStatus<:logicStatus_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(logicStatus_le)){%> and A.logicStatus<=:logicStatus_le <%}%> <%if(has(tenantName)){%> AND tenantName=:tenantName <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantName_not)){%> and A.tenantName <> :tenantName_not <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantName_li)){%> and A.tenantName like '%'||:tenantName_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(phone)){%> AND phone=:phone <%}%> <%else if (has(phone_not)){%> and A.phone <> :phone_not <%}%> <%else if (has(phone_li)){%> and A.phone like '%'||:phone_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(contact)){%> AND contact=:contact <%}%> <%else if (has(contact_not)){%> and A.contact <> :contact_not <%}%> <%else if (has(contact_li)){%> and A.contact like '%'||:contact_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(remark)){%> AND remark=:remark <%}%> <%else if (has(remark_not)){%> and A.remark <> :remark_not <%}%> <%else if (has(remark_li)){%> and A.remark like '%'||:remark_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(id)){%> AND id=:id <%}%> <%else if (has(id_not)){%> and A.id <> :id_not <%}%> <%else if (has(id_li)){%> and A.id like '%'||:id_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(id_gt)){%> and A.id>:id_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(id_ge)){%> and A.id>=:id_ge <%}%> <%if (has(id_lt)){%> and A.id<:id_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(id_le)){%> and A.id<=:id_le <%}%> <%if(has(createDateTime)){%> AND createDateTime=:createDateTime <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_not)){%> and A.createDateTime <> :createDateTime_not <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_li)){%> and A.createDateTime like '%'||:createDateTime_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(createDateTime_gt)){%> and A.createDateTime>:createDateTime_gt <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_ge)){%> and A.createDateTime>=:createDateTime_ge <%}%> <%if (has(createDateTime_lt)){%> and A.createDateTime<:createDateTime_lt <%}%> <%else if (has(createDateTime_le)){%> and A.createDateTime<=:createDateTime_le <%}%> <%if (has(orderby)) {%> ORDER BY A.${orderby} <%if (has(sort)){%> ${sort} <%}else{%> ASC <%}%> <%}%>
